TopicTitle: Kerbal Aircraft Corp Aircraft On Demand Service

Articles.Content:
Kerbal Aircraft Corp requests your specifications!

Post specifications of the aircraft you want and have them delivered within one week if the engineers find the time.

We will reply with a craft file once complete.

At Kerbal Aircraft Corp, it is our aim to make sure your aircraft needs are fulfilled with quality and humor.

Welcome to our forum, Kerbal Aircraft Corp.

Now here's an odd and annoying rule we had to set up here, which is that folks can't pretend that they are companies or countries (2.2.j). The problem is, it has a tendency to cause huge and nasty fights on the forum. It's fine to use that name and a lot of us have pretend company logos. You are also welcome to make ships for people, if they ask. But no hiring/firing of other players as employees, taking on "contracts," or payments for services, and that sort of thing. 

So don't run with scissors, swim within half an hour of eating, or pretend you're a company, but have fun!

I agree, I'm just doing this for fun and of course for other people!

Also engineers means only me

Edited November 6, 2018 by Kerbal Aircraft Corp.
extra info

Okay then. Have fun.
Careful there. Do not wash in cold water or feed after midnight.
